Summary: i saw 2 types of objects but pure accidentally.i will describe more detailed.
divs: Sighting Detailshi.i am a 22 years old boy from cluj-napoca city in romania.i am a hobby photographer and i like to take photos in nature.near my house there is an ex parachute tower(now it is used to train dogs) and i made some photos of it because the light was great(it was sunset around 8 pm) but i discovered some flying things in the sky after i took the picture only,then i looked to the sky and was nothing there.the real thing is that on that day i made some photos of cluj napoca (because i live on a hill and from a point i can see the whole city) and i observe that beneath the other hill there are some flying darkish globe,circular things.i will send the pictures and i would really like some answers.i BELIVE in extraterestrial life and i am fascinated about this subiect i watch documentaries about e.t life and ufo's.i would like to know if there are some ufo's in my pictures or there is something else.thank you.(the pitures were taken his summer in july.i send the pictures to a lot of ppl but i didn't get any answer )
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cluj-Napoca
This sighting has never been favorited.
